text: Allahale pavitra ghara ka'abala'i sam'manita sthana bana'unuko sathai manisaharuka nimti sahayoga ra sadhanaka lagi madhyama bana'eko cha ra pavitra mahinaharula'i pani ra kurbaniko janavaraharula'i pani jasaka ghamtiharuma pattaharu bamdhi'eka hunchan yo yasakaranale ho ki timile janihala ki je–jati akasaharuma chan ra je–jati prthvima chan allahala'i sabaiko jnana cha, ra yo pani ki allaha hareka kurako jnata cha
